Make List of Current DM State

Source: R/DM_Server.R
DM_mk_preload.Rd

Reads in the app state from yaml files.

Usage

DM_mk_preload(state)

Arguments

state

DM state object

Value

list with the following elements

  • isgood: Boolean indicating the exit status of the function.

  • msgs: Messages to be passed back to the user.

  • yaml_list: Lists with preload components.

Examples

sess_res = DM_test_mksession()
#> → ASM: including file
#> → ASM:   source: file.path(system.file(package="onbrand"), "templates", "report.docx")
#> → ASM:   dest:   file.path("config","report.docx")
#> → ASM: including file
#> → ASM:   source: file.path(system.file(package="onbrand"), "templates", "report.pptx")
#> → ASM:   dest:   file.path("config","report.pptx")
#> → ASM: including file
#> → ASM:   source: file.path(system.file(package="onbrand"), "templates", "report.yaml")
#> → ASM:   dest:   file.path("config","report.yaml")
#> → ASM: State initialized
#> → ASM: setting word placeholders: 
#> → ASM:   -> setting docx ph: HEADERLEFT = left header
#> → ASM:   -> setting docx ph: HEADERRIGHT = right header
#> → ASM:   -> setting docx ph: FOOTERLEFT = left footer
#> → ASM: module isgood: TRUE
#> → DM: including file
#> → DM:   source: file.path(system.file(package="onbrand"), "templates", "report.docx")
#> → DM:   dest:   file.path("config","report.docx")
#> → DM: including file
#> → DM:   source: file.path(system.file(package="onbrand"), "templates", "report.pptx")
#> → DM:   dest:   file.path("config","report.pptx")
#> → DM: including file
#> → DM:   source: file.path(system.file(package="onbrand"), "templates", "report.yaml")
#> → DM:   dest:   file.path("config","report.yaml")
#> → DM: module checksum updated: eab3a64a67d5051360245fc5102d8f11
#> → DM: State initialized
#> → DM: ds checksum updated: 8f8fb1c9c5591194e29d678c59dd65a3
#> → DM: module checksum updated: 02ad1aa7547ec903848451a547d1b96a
#> → DM: adding preload sources
#> → DM:  - file added: TEST_DATA.xlsx
#> → DM: added: TEST_DATA.xlsx
#> → DM:  - url added: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/john-harrold/formods/refs/heads/master/inst/test_data/SDTM_PC.csv
#> → DM: url added: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/john-harrold/formods/refs/heads/master/inst/test_data/SDTM_PC.csv
#> → DM:  - url added: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/john-harrold/formods/refs/heads/master/inst/test_data/SDTM_EX.csv
#> → DM: url added: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/john-harrold/formods/refs/heads/master/inst/test_data/SDTM_EX.csv
#> → DM:  - url added: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/john-harrold/formods/refs/heads/master/inst/test_data/SDTM_DM.csv
#> → DM: url added: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/john-harrold/formods/refs/heads/master/inst/test_data/SDTM_DM.csv
#> → DM: loading element idx: 1
#> → DM: ds checksum updated: 1e4fd80f64600fd3760bb7ac80de853d
#> → DM: module checksum updated: b46f7d327132696b36b75760f60de7ba
#> → DM: added element idx: 1
#> → DM: loading element idx: 2
#> → DM: ds checksum updated: 44aaa452677c16c7e9e2da5ea1deed69
#> → DM: module checksum updated: 86fb1ea97b8cf759c593c348bd8f8575
#> → DM: added element idx: 2
#> → DM: loading element idx: 3
#> → DM: ds checksum updated: c99be63f7d03f2e513b4480c0a4e9e96
#> → DM: module checksum updated: 2dcc7bc4744822ae643c6e0f16d502d7
#> → DM: added element idx: 3

#> → DM: ds checksum updated: 28b5c4008795e0accdc871f7b2fe11d8
#> → DM: module checksum updated: 54d651a7bf45ea69c4096c9791ebf318
#> → DM: added element idx: 4
#> → DM: module isgood: TRUE
state = sess_res$state
res = DM_mk_preload(state)
#> → DM: saving source (1) data/DM/TEST_DATA.xlsx
#> → DM: saving source (2) https://raw.githubusercontent.com/john-harrold/formods/refs/heads/master/inst/test_data/SDTM_PC.csv
#> → DM: saving source (3) https://raw.githubusercontent.com/john-harrold/formods/refs/heads/master/inst/test_data/SDTM_EX.csv
#> → DM: saving source (4) https://raw.githubusercontent.com/john-harrold/formods/refs/heads/master/inst/test_data/SDTM_DM.csv
#> → DM: saving element (1) Excel (from file)
#> → DM: saving element (2) STDM PC (url)
#> → DM: saving element (3) STDM EX (url)
#> → DM: saving element (5) STDM DM (url)
#> → DM: mk_preload isgood: TRUE
